userInstructions.Translation: Please translate all checks into the specific terminology of the website's country language.
userInstructions.Catalogs/leaflets: Please review the website and all its sub-pages to identify any Promotional Leaflets, Promotional Catalogs, or Promotional Brochures. Ensure that each type of promotional material is published at least once a month. Conduct a separate check for each type of promotional material on the website.
userInstructions.Business type: Please review the website to determine the type of business it represents. Identify whether it is B2B (Business-to-Business), B2C (Business-to-Consumer), both B2B and B2C, or an agency. If none of these categories apply, indicate 'Not Found'. Conduct a separate check for each type of business classification.
userInstructions.Business model: Please review all pages on the website to determine their business model. Identify if the business model includes retail, e-commerce, physical stores, or a combination of both e-commerce and physical stores. Multiple types may apply.
